1: Although the committee faced significant opposition during the proposal phase, they ultimately succeeded in garnering support for the new policy.
(1) The committee received unanimous approval for the new policy from the beginning.
(2) Despite encountering considerable resistance, the committee managed to gain backing for the new policy.
(3) The committee was unable to convince anyone of the necessity for the new policy.
(4) The committee's proposal was rejected outright without any discussion.
2: الجملة تشير إلى أن اللجنة واجهت معارضة كبيرة أثناء مرحلة الاقتراح لكنها نجحت في الحصول على الدعم.
3: (1) غير صحيح، يتحدث عن موافقة جماعية من البداية.
